articles.description: Whether we needed another documentary about the disgraced cyclist is up for debate, but 'Lance' is an entertaining retelling of the saga, with several revealing moments that make it worth the watch.
articles.content:
Why now?
Judging by the chatter on cycling Twitter, that was the most common reaction to ESPN’s announcement earlier this month that it would be premiering Lance, a new big-budget, two-part 30 for 3… [+10644 chars]

articles.author: Brady Henderson, Vaughn McClure
articles.title: Source - Seahawks make 1-year offer to Devonta Freeman, in talks with Carlos Hyde - ESPN India
articles.description: The Seahawks have made a one-year contract offer to Pro Bowl running back Devonta Freeman and are in talks with Carlos Hyde, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content: In need of a veteran running back, the Seattle Seahawks have made a one-year offer to two-time Pro Bowler Devonta Freeman and also have been in talks with Carlos Hyde, sources confirmed to ESPN on Th… [+1781 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Carlisle
articles.title: MLS Orlando tournament taking shape with four seeded groups - sources - ESPN
articles.description: MLS would split the 26 teams into four groups, with the top two teams in each group advancing to a knockout round, sources have confirmed ESPN.
articles.content: The details surrounding the proposed MLS "mini-tournament" in Orlando are coming into focus, with the league breaking the 26 teams into four groups and with the top two teams in each group advancing … [+3218 chars]

articles.author: Jerry Bonkowski
articles.title: Kyle Busch: ‘Chase Elliott and I talked and it went really well’ - nbcsports.com
articles.description: Kyle Busch admitted after Wednesday's Cup race he was at fault for wrecking Chase Elliott. Busch has since spoken to Elliott about the incident.
articles.content:
During the course of Wednesday night’s Cup Series race at Darlington, Martin Truex Jr. was “murdered” on restarts as his No. 19 Toyota restarted in the inside lane most of the night.

articles.title: Cowboys' Aldon Smith reinstated by NFL under substance-abuse policy | Pro Football Talk | NBC Sports - NBC Sports
articles.description: Aldon Smith was reinstated under the substance-abuse policy by the NFL, and he will join the Cowboys' roster after not playing since 2015. #NBCSports #ProFoo...
